command_line: addthreads=${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1} && (( addthreads-- )) &&   addmemory=${GALAXY_MEMORY_MB_PER_SLOT:-768} && ((addmemory=addmemory*75/100)) &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/1/b/8/dataset_1b8cdd2f-0863-4ff3-8bf6-2fac90a7cc45.dat' reference.fa && samtools faidx reference.fa &&   ln -s '/galaxy/server/database/objects/f/7/9/dataset_f79ae01a-cf52-44aa-a326-664434732958.dat' infile &&         samtools view -@ $addthreads -C      -o outfile  --output-fmt-option no_ref   -T 'reference.fa' -t 'reference.fa.fai'   infile
